description: From a series of nine etchings, Das Gesicht (The Face), published by Euphorion Verlag, Berlin, 1924, housed in a blue-green portfolio case with a title page; in green ink the head and shoulders of a man with a smile on his face
inscription: LL below image, in pencil: 4 / (2) | LLC of sheet, in pencil: E. 156 |  LR of sheet, in pencil: Probedruck / 1-9
portfolio: From Plate 2 from Das Gesicht (The Face), Euphorion Verlag, Berlin, 1924
signed: LR in pencil, below image: Walter Gramatté / 23
title: Smiling Head (Self-Portrait), Plate 2 from Das Gesicht (The Face)
